summary: Reduces the color saturation of dwarven armor and weapons by -25% and -50%, so that they blend in better with Skyrim\'s color scheme.
descriptionHtml:
Reduces the color saturation of dwarven armor and weapons by -25% and -50%, so that they blend in better with Skyrim\'s color scheme.

I personally suggest that you use the -25% if you are not using Post Process Injector, and the -50% if you are using PPI to counter the additional saturation.

EDITS
11/20/11: Armor and Weapons files available.
author: Drachis

files.name: 25 Percent Desaturated Dwarven Armor and Weaps
